title: Kled W Bug
body:
Hey guys, recently picked up kled because hes really fun and i noticed that if you auto at least once with his W Violent Tendencies	and level up the ability while you still havent finished with the 4th auto in his  W. The 4th auto doesnt do extra damage or the correct animation of the 4th smack. 
If that was hard to understand ill put it like this 

Normal: [W Active] auto auto auto SMACK  
    
What ive seen happen: [W active] auto (level up W) auto auto auto (no SMACK in this one) . 

I Feel like this is due to how things were changed with singed and a couple of other champs in the past patches were if you level up singeds poision while its ticking it will now instantly do the new value of damage. I Feel like thats happening here with kled. You have the W active and you level it up, so it starts from the beginning of the ability rather than just picking up where it left off. Anyways hope this helps you guys. {{champion:240}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
To be clear, whenever you said "auto", you mean that it used the Violent Tendencies stabbing animation like the first three auto attacks usually do, right?
It wasn't using his regular, non-W auto attack animations, was it?
yeah the sped up W autos where kled stabs from the top
